snippet: Silicon Valley executives, who have long pushed for more visas for foreign-born experts in math and science, are joining forces with immigration advocates.
abstract: Silicon Valley executives, who have long pressed government to provide more visas for foreign-born experts in math and science, are joining forces with an array of immigration groups seeking comprehensive changes in the law; momentum builds in Washington for broad revamping; tech industry says more so-called high-skilled visas are critical to both its growth and that of the economy.

byline.contributor: Julia Preston contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Silicon Valley executives, who have long pushed for more visas for foreign-born experts in math and science, are joining forces with immigration advocates.

headline.seo: Tech Companies and Immigrant Advocates Press for Broad Changes in Law
headline.main: Silicon Valley and Immigrant Groups Find Common Cause
headline.print_headline: Tech Firms Join Bid for Easing Of Immigration
